name: Grand Theft Auto 5 Texture File
summary: Learn about .YTD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The YTD file is located in the directory that the GTA V game is installed on your computer with the other game resource files. It often accompanies a .GFX file with the same filename.
You will most likely only come across the YTD file if you are modifying gameplay in GTA V. You can use the Open IV program, which is used for modding GTA V, Grand Theft Auto IV, and Max Payne 3.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
